We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a competent and detail-oriented Account Officer to manage day-to-day accounting functions and support overall financial operations.
	The ideal candidate must be able to handle payables, receivables, bank reconciliations, ledger entries, and project expense tracking with accuracy and professionalism.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage accounts payable and receivable processes.
	Prepare and reconcile bank statements regularly.
	Update and maintain general ledger entries.
	Track project-related expenses and ensure proper documentation.
	Assist with month-end and year-end financial reporting.
	Support budgeting, forecasting, and financial reviews.
	Maintain orderly financial filing systems.
	Ensure compliance with accounting standards and company policies.


Requirements


	HND/BSc in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	3&ndash;5 years of proven experience as an Account Officer or similar role.
	Strong understanding of basic accounting principles.
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., Sage, QuickBooks, ERP).
	Excellent analytical, numerical, and problem-solving skills.
	High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
	Good communication and organizational skills.


Salary
Open.

Method of Application

Employment Type: Full-time
